title: Ghosts Not Welcome
description: This week June and Jessica get a bit spooky with Spiders and Ghosts and Green Hair, OH MY! June shares a shocking lesson about using purple shampoo, then opens up about her "Oprah's Full Circle" moment with a photo of her as a child. Then, Jessica digs into why she will NEVER see a ghost and recounts a horror story a friend once shared with her. Deep Divers, after this episode make sure there aren't any bogies attached to ya.
author: thedeepdive@earwolf.com (Earwolf & Jessica St. Clair, June Diane Rapheal)
